------- Bug moved to this database by unknown@bugzilla.gnome.org 2002-05-28 11:31 -------
The original reporter (jorgelaranjo@hotmail.com) of this bug does not have an account here. Reassigning to the exporter, unknown@bugzilla.gnome.org. Reassigning to the default owner of the component, anjuta2-maint@bugzilla.gnome.org.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 59361 ***

bug.short_desc: Can't block image sites with client side imagemaps

comment.text:
Pages that include client-side imagemaps don't show the image-related entries (such as "block images from") in the conext menu if the menu is created from one of the regions in the map. This is quite annoying if the entire image is a map.
Noticed on www.nytimes.com, example at http://graphics.lcs.mit.edu/~thouis/test1.html

WONTFIX for this branch
Thanks for the testcase
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 97383 ***
